definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。

sentences.english: I thought it would raise a smile with people at the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我想它能给前来参观展览的人带来笑容。

sentences.english: The exhibition of folk customs includes an attractive display of local foods.
sentences.chinese: 家乡风味食品在这届民俗民风展览会上引众人注目。

sentences.english: They have just put some pictures on a display board.
sentences.chinese: 他们刚把一些图片放到展览板上。

sentences.english: Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 请问阁下是否有兴趣优先登记以下展览会？

sentences.english: Lishui City Planning Exhibition Hall warmly welcomes your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 丽水市城市规划展览馆竭诚欢迎您的到来。

sentences.english: Ane-mail address of the organization responsible for correspondence related to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 有关展览的电子邮件通讯地址的组织工作。

sentences.english: They all curate exhibitions, publish books and catalogs , and organize conferences and symposia.
sentences.chinese: 他们策划展览，出版书籍和手册，组织会议和论坛。

sentences.english: More costly to get to workshops and shows
sentences.chinese: 去工场或展览的成本更高。

sentences.english: A fun fair for O's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 一个给O庆祝生日的有趣展览会啊。

sentences.english: I'm at Earls Court Exhibition Center in London.
sentences.chinese: 我正在伦敦的厄尔斯考特展览中心。

sentences.english: Mr. Bu Deyin, Deputy Director, Economic Forecasting Department, State Information Center.
sentences.chinese: 德国科隆展览中国有限公司董事总经理冯向军先生。

sentences.english: In addition to the Pavilion and the Greenhouse, the exhibition will include a 13 story-tall observation tower.
sentences.chinese: 除了馆和温室，该展览还包括一个13层高的瞭望塔。

sentences.english: I am going to see an exhibition about Australia.
sentences.chinese: 那一个人去看展览实在是划不来。

sentences.english: The carriage used to carry the king was on display in the museum.
sentences.chinese: 那辆用来载送国王的马车，在博物馆中展览。

sentences.english: Raw Space Exhibitors have to carpet, design and construct their own floor space.
sentences.chinese: 展览光地参展商须自行设计及盖建展位，并铺上地毯。

definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
